                           Release Notes
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Comments :
Two brothers, one a mild-mannered hardware store manager (Paxton), 
the other an unemployed slob (Thornton) and a friend stumble onto $4.4 
million cash in stolen money. The newfound booty leads Paxton&#039;s character, 
Hank, (with help from his cunning wife) to great lengths to keep the 
money a secret from local authorities. The three men begin to doubt each 
other&#039;s trust, which leads to lies and deceit.

Director : Sam Raimi

Writers: Scott B. Smith (novel)
         Scott B. Smith (screenplay)
